Class QuestionAnswerTestbed

java.lang.Object
test.QuestionAnswerTestbed
public class QuestionAnswerTestbed extends Object
QuestionAnswerTestbed is a standalone test harness for the Questionâ€“Answer system. It simulates posting questions and answers and tests specific scenarios: 1) Posting an empty question should produce an error message "Empty question". 2) Posting a valid question should display "Message successfully posted" and add the question. 3) Posting an empty answer should produce an error message "Empty answer". 4) Posting a valid answer should display "Message successfully posted" and add the answer. 5) Attempting to filter for resolved answers when none exist should produce "Nothing to filter. Please try again". Run the main method to see the test results. Note: Since the underlying TP2 classes (Questions, Question, Answers, and Answer) do not enforce input validation, the test harness simulates the expected business rules.
Version:
1.0
Author:

    • testEmptyQuestion

      public static boolean testEmptyQuestion()
      Test 1: Posting an empty question. Simulates that if a user enters an empty question, the system returns an error message.
      Returns:
      true if the simulated error message is correct; false otherwise.

    • testValidQuestionPost

      public static boolean testValidQuestionPost()
      Test 2: Posting a valid question. Verifies that a valid question is successfully added.
      Returns:
      true if the question is added; false otherwise.

    • testEmptyAnswer

      public static boolean testEmptyAnswer()
      Test 3: Posting an empty answer. Simulates that if a user enters an empty answer, the system returns an error message.
      Returns:
      true if the simulated error message is correct; false otherwise.

    • testValidAnswerPost

      public static boolean testValidAnswerPost()
      Test 4: Posting a valid answer. Verifies that a valid answer is successfully added to a question.
      Returns:
      true if the answer is added; false otherwise.

    • testFilterNoResolvedAnswers

      public static boolean testFilterNoResolvedAnswers()
      Test 5: Filtering when no resolved answers exist. Simulates filtering for resolved answers. If none exist, the system should return an error message.
      Returns:
      true if the correct error message is produced; false otherwise.
